jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
The Head of Business Development drives end to end business development for Go-Fresh. You will manage Go-Fresh’s sales team (key account managers, telesales, and canvassers) and sales operation functions. Your primary KPI will be to scale our merchant base and drive long-lasting merchant engagement. You will be taking an initial pilot BD team and scaling it up to achieve our business goals. You will be joining a fun, fast-paced, high-growth company and will embrace the challenge of solving critical business problems 

Key Responsibilities 
● Building out the sales org, in particular, rapidly recruiting key second-line leaders, and a sales execution team. 
● Establishing sales operations and management functions (audit, L&D, sales planning, KPI, incentives) 
● Define strategic goals and targets for the sales team along with the business leader. Day to day management of the team to achieve targets. Coaching and mentoring second-line leaders, and the team 
● On-going sales motion and sales process improvement including refining of sales processes. Including understanding the key issues impacting the sales team and developing solutions to help drive improved productivity

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• At least 12 years of sales leadership experience at one or more established FMCG companies
  • Managed a sales canvassing team of at least 200 people nationwide
  • Managed sales operations, sales management, and trade marketing functions
  • Demonstrated ability to lead the team in achieving sales targets
  • Ground up experience building up a sales organization from inception
  • Execution focused, fast learner and strong team player
